# [[necrophilia]]; [[sex acts]] with a [[corpse]]

=====Usage notes=====
Usually refers to the '''act''' of sexual relations with a corpse, as [[死体性愛]] and [[屍慾]] / [[死欲]] refers to the '''attraction''' without a necessary sex act, however, this distinction is not always made and can be interchangeable.
